title: Since the new teased champion is known as the River King...
body: Please, give him some special quotes, something like "This is MY LAND!" when he kills the Scuttle Crab. It makes so much sense.

replies.body: confirmed by riot, he has 14 passives, every ability has cc and is a blink or dash and his ult scales 100 percent off of his health and ap and ad and stuns for 6 seconds.
He can also knock up turrets.
That's some impressive fertility.
And that's how {{champion:74}} turrets are made
{{champion:112}} Join the *glorious* {{champion:74}}-revolution.
and every time he lands an ability (which are all point and click) every tower loses 100 health that it cannot regain. When all towers are gone this is doubled against the nexus
100 is to much. It should be 99, that will seperate the good River Kings from the Great.

> [{quoted}](name=LittleBlast,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=0000000200000000,timestamp=2015-06-23T02:48:26.531+0000)
>
> 100 is to much. It should be 99, that will seperate the good River Kings from the Great.

he should only be able to do this after the minions have spawned
"situational burst"

Also his ult heals his whole team and rebuilds destroyed structures.

On top of that one of his passives is that if he hits lvl 18 enemy nexus explodes and he (only he, NOT his team) wins the game.
He can also one shot baron and drag and the same time from anywhere on the map at any level.
finally a champion where i can afk to take a shit and still be relevant
So Riot does listen

> [{quoted}](name=xBRUT4L LEG3CYx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-22T20:16:32.375+0000)

> confirmed by riot, he has 14 passives, every ability has cc and is a blink or dash and his ult scales 100 percent off of his health and ap and ad and stuns for 6 seconds.

i believe this

>
> i believe this

Zenon confirmed he has a slow on his Q and 3 passives,

He also confirmed a lack of: Knock-ups, Executes, true damage

You're an idiot.
You didn't even mention the speed buff or the fact that he's resourceless.

> [{quoted}](name=xBRUT4L LEG3CYx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-22T20:16:32.375+0000)
>
> confirmed by riot, he has 14 passives, every ability has cc and is a blink or dash and his ult scales 100 percent off of his health and ap and ad and stuns for 6 seconds.

I wouldn't be surprised anymore if they'll release kits like these. Ekko is the purest example of design failure
DOES HE HAVE SILENCES?
Nah,that's very weak.It's missing some true damage.
better nerf Irelia and give her true damage to the River King.

No, he only has 3 passives actually (confirmed by his designer ZenonTheStoic).

I really hope that he has an om-nom-nom ult like Cho'gath based on the teaser...
these comments alone are just trying to make a broken champion.
he also leaves a permanent river trail wherever he goes that deals percent hp damage to anyone who crosses it and gives him 50 percent bonus movement speed
"you're in my swamp now"
It's never ogre...
its only ogre when he says it's ogre

> [{quoted}](name=Exotic Tuna Can,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-06-22T20:06:21.098+0000)
>
> Please, give him some special quotes, something like "This is MY LAND!" when he kills the Scuttle Crab. It makes so much sense.

I want him to be a total glib sarcastic son of a gun to Fizz, too.

Like a Louisianan Riverboat Gambler talking down to a charlatan.

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey Trouble,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-22T22:43:34.515+0000)
>
> I want him to be a total glib sarcastic son of a gun to Fizz, too.
> 
> Like a Louisianan Riverboat Gambler talking down to a charlatan.

The River King's got Friends on the Other Side!

> [{quoted}](name=LungDrakkar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=t3Go4qo6,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-06-22T22:52:34.593+0000)
>
> The River King's got Friends on the Other Side!

_Don't you disrespect me little fish!
Don't you denigrate or wag a fin!
You're in my world not your world now,
and it's all thanks to you letting me in!_

_'It's all thanks to you letting me in!'_

_That's an echo gentlemen
Just a little somethin' we have here in Louisiana
Little parlor trick, don't worry!_

_Go ahead and let me in!
Put your mind at ease!
If relaxin' enable
Me to do anything I please!_

_I can give you riches
I can change it 'round some too!
I'll look deep into your heart and soul!
(You do have a soul, don't you Fizz?)
Make your wildest dreams come true!_

You meant that FAT LOCHNESS GENTLEMAN CHO GATHIC CATFISH?  I've never been less excited for a champ before.  I already hate the guy.  I see it already...this guy is going to be the HHH of League of Legends.  The most shi&%* overrated stat poorly designed bloated pos champ in LOL history.
I know its so exciting, I'm getting him first day too.
That voice just deserves an insta-buy by itself.
Why does everyone think this is a new champion trailer. It's obviously hinting at a new Skuttle Crab rework. - Kappa
Confirmed - Skuttle is new baron.
There is only one River King {{champion:98}}
River as a new position confirmed

ult: Cosmic gamble

after channeling for 3.33 seconds, either does 9001 true dmg to all players on the map or does 9001 dmg to himself and destroy enemy nexus

'_'
should have some special interaction with gromp

RekSai of river?

Now i am in bot
Now i am in top
"The best part is, so is my adc/jungler!"
well as i made this comment before i saw his kit, I could have not known that.

Guys, It's a thing! Riot DID IT :D

RIVER QUOTESSS
"WHAT ARE YOU DOING IN MY RIFT?"
"This is MY Feeding grounds!"  makes more sense
After he gets killed twice in the river.
Gromp + Gentlemen Cho'Gath {{champion:31}} = River King?
LAND?? You mean water/river?

the river king says, "cry me a river..."  it'll be funny if he actually does...but with riot's current "streak" of champions, who knows how things will go

bard seems one of their most balanced champions and he's not balanced at all...he's entirely early game and a little utility late
I hope he gets a movement speed buff while he's running through the water. :^)
This new champ seems big. If Riot somehow gives him overkill mobility I'm going to kill someone.
